title: Jaeseok Hwang
text:
Welcome
Hi, I’m a Ph.D. candidate in the Agricultural and Consumer Economics(ACE) at the University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign. My research focuses on data based farm input management and productivity analysis. This website showcases my work, including my Resume(CV), Research, Essays, and more.




 Back to top
